directiveList.name: LyTypography
directiveList.selector: `[lyTyp]`
directiveList.inputs:
[
  "color"
]

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -1

ngModuleList.name: LyTypographyModule
ngModuleList.children: import { LyTypographyModule } from '@alyle/ui/typography'
